website_summaries.verdict: Weighing in under 3 pounds, this volleyball set is easy to pack, inflate, and play a game of pool volleyball with the kids.
pros: At a desirable price point, this volleyball court is easy entertainment for both kids and adults
Surprisingly larger than expected, you can get everyone in the pool to play so long as some players know how to tread water in the deep end
Brightly colored and keeps the focus on having fun
cons: You may need to come up with a few DIY hacks to secure the court and prevent it from drifting around

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool game!
customer_reviews.text: My family & I had a blast using this volleyball net in the pool. I read reviews that your not suppose to keep it in the sun everyday or the net starts to go down hill. So we do deflate it every time we use it. The weights don't hold the net in place so we put the weights on the sides of the pool works for us because we have a rectangle pool. Don't know how it would work with a circle pool. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best bang for my buck so far in pool toys. Really pleased with this! It’s low enough that my kids can play but really fills up my 15’ Intex pool. We used the strings and tied the net to the frame on both sides instead of using the weighted bags, but either would work fine. You could carefully blow this up with an air compressor but I blew it up myself and it still only took a few minutes, so it’s totally doable if you don’t have one.
customer_reviews.author: wvliz07

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Put rocks in the bags to keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Put rocks in the bags to keep it weighted in the pool. Huge hit at our house party.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyVrooom

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I made some modifications on this, as there are 2 bags that hang to the side that serve as weights which do nothing regardless of what you put in it. I removed the bags and used longer string and have it anchored to the sides of the pool when we play, that did the trick and made this actually functional. HOURS of fun. What I would like to see is the set include 2 balls as anything could happen and the ball is rather small. Also, something on there that would keep score as that debate takes longer than inflating the actual net.
customer_reviews.author: PrimePrincess

customer_reviews.title: Three years and still love this Intex volleyball set!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, we cannot believe how many hours of fun our family has had with this volleyball set in our pool! I had to write this review to double-thumbs up for anyone debating. It's spent three summers in/out of our chlorine pool and has held up beautifully! We can't wait to use it again this summer--just waiting for warmer temps and we'll be playing for hours more. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for pool volleyball in my apartment pool with my friends. We are all adults and it is a tiny bit small and obviously you get what you pay for but I will use it again and it worked for our needs. We used it all night but keep in mind it is small and is hard to keep in place. If anyone wants to play super serious volleyball, I would go elsewhere. But for playing a fun game with family and friends, I would highly suggest this. Can't get better for $10
customer_reviews.author: Calli Collins

customer_reviews.title: Deflates easily but fun
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun easy to inflate pool float and makes for a fun game of volleyball with the net. It does deflate when sitting for a few days, which kinda stinks that you have to inflate before each use (which is why I docked one star)...but for the money it's a good net. We have had fun using it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: Net stand doesn't stay inflated long. Needs inflated throughout play (in same day) without rough play. Don't bother using the ball that's included... doesn't go far, barely makes it over the net. My kids used a play ball from (the toy section) Walmart. Ropes to weight bags dry rotted and ripped within a month. It's going in the trash when we close the pool. I've already wasted money and time. I won't waste space storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball net material disintegrated after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this floating volleyball net to play with my kids over the summer. The material the net is made out of is cheap and disintegrated into tiny bits of string after a couple of months. It was fine for the first couple of uses but after that, it took me a second to realize that the tiny bits of string I kept having to clean out of my pool and pool filter were actually the volleyball net. When I touched the net to verify my suspicions, it fell apart like it was made out of paper. Worthless item due to poor quality construction materials being used. Crap like this is why are landfills are so full.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Pool fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this volleyball net for the pool. We used an air compressor to inflate the frame. It was simple to tie the net on and it came with two bags to fill for weight (we used a heavy rock in each bag). The inflated frame lasted 2 years blown up and then started to lose air. The price is so good that we bought a replacement without hesitating. Cheaper than most pool floats! It really gives everyone something fun to play in the pool. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: 2SF

customer_reviews.title: Not very usable for pools
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Flimsy. Couldn’t get the net to stay up because the side blow up stand/net holder kept folding over. When the next got wet the problem got worse. Wasn’t sure what to put in the anchor bags to hold it in place. They have holes in them so the water goes right through the bags. I guess I need to find rocks big enough not to go through the holes or float out of the bags. It floats around rather easy making the playing a little difficult. The price beats paying hundreds but not real usable.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I bought it for my 24' above ground pool and the family loves it. I thought I would not like the ball that came with it (from other reviews) and would have to use a real volleyball but I didn't. The ball is great and so much fun. We played for hours. The net did not take up the entire pool and so little ones still had an area to play out of the way. The only thing is the weight bags didn't keep it real stable. We ended up putting bricks in the bags and my toe came in contact more than once..
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a volleyball net for our above ground pool for awhile now that is easy to take up & down and happened upon this. We've used it a couple of times in the pool but have not yet put the bags that hold rock to help anchor it. I think we will really enjoy this. Only downfall is the blowup volleyball didn't last past the second day but we have a pool volleyball already so no big issue for us. I think this is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: boldfield77

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my pool, since we were expecting a family visit. First of all, my husband thought my purchase was stupid and a waste of money - but he was so wrong! The family loved playing volleyball in our pool and over the 5 day visit there wasn’t a day they didn’t play with the Intex Pool Volleyball game. In addition, I’ve read other reviews that said the ball wasn’t any good, but my family thought everything about Intex was great. No problems at all and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Slicher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for some fun!
customer_reviews.text: So for 25bux this was not bad..I still have it up after a month of use. The issue was that we could not fix it off the pool, so we added a dumbell weight and let it anchor in the pool and other side tied down out of the pool on the ground. This way we had a stable setup and we played for about an hour or more of fun. Ididn't use their weights, I had a sand bag and that made it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: AfterhourshopTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a little on the small side but that is exactly what I wanted. I didn't want a full size volleyball net, I wanted a slightly smaller one that a couple of adults or kids could use in the pool and toss of to the side when not in use, and this is it. When we use it I put bricks in the bags and I leave them on top of the pool deck instead of dropping them in the water and that works perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jawlek

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Good value, it has held up well with regular, everyday hard use for over a month. A few things to note: -the volleyball bit the dust the first day -make sure you have a powered inflation device, like an Air Hawk, or it will take you a couple of days to blow it up manually -the anchoring system needs to be modified...invest a few bucks for a long length of nylon cord from Home Depot, and run it thru the net and anchor to each side of the pool All-in-all very happy with the purchase...and would recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ200

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the pool. Great play. Recommend for when swimming alone gets boring.
customer_reviews.text: Cool, super fun pool toy for children and adults alike. Yes, the net system floats and is huge. The soccer ball isn't very big. It's about size of a softball, but does the job. Us a air pump to fill up or you'll get winded for inflating the base. So far, so good on this end. We're glad we purchased this. Lots of fun in the pool when swimming alone gets boring. Be sure to store when not using or it'l blow away in the wind, especially in an above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I also do not like having rocks in my pool so I put the ...
customer_reviews.text: We found this hard to keep still in the pool even when the "weight bags" were filled with rocks as instructed. I also do not like having rocks in my pool so I put the rocks in a ziplock baggie before putting them in the weight bags. The ball is smaller than a normal beach ball and this thing is annoying to store. It is also small, I have a small above ground pool and it doesn't really do the job. I went back to just hooking a rope to the side of my deck. Do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Snuugans

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made on Amazon. While getting the netting hooked up right and having to inflate this was a bit of a pain, once done it was well worth it! Had a blast yesterday in the pool with the kids. For $10.00...really? If it popped a hole tomorrow I wouldn’t feel bad at all and would just order another one. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Great fun toy for the pool. This is my third one now. The netting only seems to last for one year. Really for 10 bucks for a pool toy that’s for all summer is not bad. And everybody has a blast. It came superquick just in time for the kids party. I tie it to the sides of my pool. Because the weights wouldn’t keep it in place. But a $10 toy you can’t go wrong for kids & Adults to have fun in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pass

customer_reviews.title: Great in the pool, make sure to use enough weight in the weight bags; get a different ball
customer_reviews.text: This net was perfect for our pool. It took awhile to inflate, but no surprise given its size. Do make sure to use enough weight in the weight bags that hold down each side to keep the net in place during heavy motion by the players! Also, we used a separate volley ball that was a bit more like a normal one - the thin plastic white one that comes with it may be fine for 6 year olds, but not very good for older folks. Would certainly get again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Coral Springs, FL

customer_reviews.title: Not for 6+.  Maybe for 4-6 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Wont stay in place in the pool. Goes sideways even if its weighted down with the bags filled with rocks. A wind of 2 mph or greater will blow it around in the water. The ball is so light if you hit it, even lightly..it goes too far. Not for a large area pool..maybe a kiddie pool. Going in the garbage today Good idea tho.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball and badminton in pool so fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, you still need to tie it to sides of pool otherwise it still moves a bit. We had fun with volleyball and pool badminton! As an Amazonaholic, I rely heavily on reviews from other users so I aim to contribute helpful reviews myself. Please let me know if you found my review helpful and feel free to comment if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Z9z9z9

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This could be a total game changer for your pool. I'm using it in a 16 X 48 Intex round pool and there is plenty of room for 2 to 4 people to play. My 9 year old son played volleyball for the first time with this, and we didn't take a break for 2 1/2 hours. You definitely want to use an air compressor to blow the thing up, but once it's up, it's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. GRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The kids were not impressed. We have an 18ft wide pool and this was not wide enough, even with the strings, to tie it to each side. Very flimsy. Wont stay still long enough to play with if it isn't anchored. This basically is collecting dust in a corner of the garage now.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Price

customer_reviews.title: Not for the pros...but a fun addition to a pool for any age
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than expected and at first I thought I wasted my money (but it was very inexpensive so no harm done). However, we put it in the pool and have used it several times. It's not the net for anyone looking for a challenging or aggressive game. It's fun to have around when you just want to have fun throwing the ball back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Starhooven

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old loves this volleyball net. Entertains her for hours. I also purchased larger beach balls based upon another review. However, I've found that the Intex ball that comes with the net is perfect for one-on-one or two-on two challenges. Its easier to control than a large beach balls that is easily affected by wind. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Kids never got to play with it
customer_reviews.text: The net frame and ball would not stay inflated, and the net was barely attached though we followed instructions. The kids never got to play with it even though they waited for it to arrive for a long time and were so excited. Definitely a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive inflatable game net
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this has been a great addition to our kids' playtime in the pool. It has lasted throughout the summer swim season and continues to be a hit when guests come over to play in the pool. We had to tie down each end to the side of the pool since it does move around a lot in the breeze and/or moving water. We simply used some longer nylon rope and tied it to stakes in the ground near the pool's edge. Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water volleyball set for the price. We didn't end up needing to put rocks into the bags to hold it down because we were able to tie each side to the pool. It has lasted all summer and hopefully survives being packed away for the next few months so we can use it again next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buy one every year
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new one of these volleyball nets every year for our pool. The inflatable parts lasts from year to year, but the net basically rots away after one summer in the Florida heat. Cheap enough to just get another. I use a chunk of a landscaping brick in each side for the weights to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Built sturdy for months of fun
customer_reviews.text: this is the third year in a row that we have purchased this. Not because it can not handle the normal wear and tear of a pool game but because we use it every week it is so much fun but we can remove it easily and store it when we do not need to use it. although our home is in Florida we still have a heated pool since we use it all year round. this is always a ton of fun for guests from 7yrs to 75yrs
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mancia

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd one. The first one I got at 5 Below for $5 The net doesn't seem to be made for pools or outdoor. The inflatable part on my first and second one is still in great condition the net is what breaks and shreds. But even for the $15 it is worth buying, we use it almost every time we are in the pool, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fun use for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s great quality and we sturdy in water! The weight bags which we used rocks to weight down are really useful! Its been fun to use for our kids and grown ups too at pool parties, family time and just kids playing. Good quality and has been left on side of fence while not in use and has held up very good till we pack it up and store in a large zip log bag. We didn’t tie correctly the last use but all is good we just didn’t tie net in proper place (not a product failure)
customer_reviews.author: MomLife Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our narrow pool
customer_reviews.text: This little inflatable volleyball that works great for our pool. It was bigger than I thought it would be, but we have a very narrow pool. It sits exactly. It comes with bags attached to the sides you can put rocks in to help with it down. It was easy to blow up with an electric pump and my kids love playing with it. I'm sure in the harsh Arizona sun it won't last long so we have them playing out of the water after we're done with it but it's easy to do. We just put it under shade and so far it's held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: MOgle

customer_reviews.title: Work Nice
customer_reviews.text: Work nice and is light and soft. It does not take up much room, so we just push it to the side when not using. Like that you can adjust net lower as my kids are still young. Anchors are not enough to keep it steady if the wind begins to blow, but you can always add rocks or other items in them to help. Ball is 'beach ball' style, so it is light and won't be bothered by water; works well if you do not inflate it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Exhausting to Inflate, but
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pool toy. My nephews and niece love it. It's about 8 feet long. Used the old lung to inflate it, it was exhausting, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Duran

customer_reviews.title: Missing net!
customer_reviews.text: Missing the actual net! This is the second time I have ordered it but this time it arrived with no net! Hope they see this and send me the net.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ortiz-Greenler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 2 of these over the last couple of years. The first stayed in the pool for over a year and held up well. The net itself started to fall apart after a year in the sun and after some checking around it was actually cheaper to buy a whole new set then to just buy a replacement net.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy, price is good.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this it had been used and was missing the net. Actually looked like it had been shipped multiple times. I sent it back and tried again. The second one I received has been good and contained all the parts. Filled it with air, attached net. Very easy set up. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheZombieEater

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball game for the pool
customer_reviews.text: People are raising prices due to the quarantine but I found this volleyball net for a good price. The same item is selling for over 50$ bucks. It’s bigger than expected and works well with our 16*48 intel pool. The seller did not try to rip me off and sold for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: GINGER

customer_reviews.title: Stay volleyball next, stay!
customer_reviews.text: It is big! I am having a hard time keeping it in one location in the pool. The weight bags have holes, so it floats in different directions. If the weight bags didnt have hole, I could place them on the side of the pool. However I eliminated them and tied the a strings to objects then it stayed. Overall we are having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Adams

customer_reviews.title: if you're a fun loving parent that enjoys being silly with their kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised at some of the negative reviews. Especially from some adults saying its for kids, well yes it clearly says ages 6+, what do you expect? A regulation size professional water volley net??? And for $11.00??? Come on now, if you're a fun loving parent that enjoys being silly with their kids and play some pool volleyball with a floating net that sometimes floats around (big deal) I have 8 yr old twin girls and we have team games one with me and one with dad and we have fun, oh did I mention $11.00??
customer_reviews.author: R. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy & my kids have played the heck out of it already. Lots of friends has come over & it has provided lots of entertainment for them all - ages 7yrs - 12yrs have enjoyed it. I gave it 4 stars because the ball didn’t last long, but I wasn’t surprised, and the net saga when it gets wet because the ties begin to slip (maybe plastic clips would prevent some of the sagging?) overall, it is great fun for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee K.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at our pool party! It was perfect for a standard in ground pool. Easy to put together and did not take long to do so. This was a great buy and would definitely buy again if needed to. As far as how long it will hold up, I am uncertain but it sure is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Check for missing parts right away!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Volleyball Game product in May in anticipation of a visit from my grandchildren in August. I did not set it up until they arrived and was dismayed to learn that the net was not in the box with the other parts. When I contacted Intex to get the net, I was informed it was not covered by warranty because 90 days had elapsed since my purchase. I could not buy the part, I needed to buy a new Volleyball Game. If all the parts are provided, I think this is a pretty good game, but check to be sure everything is there as soon as it arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a random item I saw when looking for something to keep us (adults) entertained in the pool. It took a while to inflate but overall super easy and kept us entertained for hours. Good exercise and tons of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ashfont

customer_reviews.title: ITS BIGGGGGGG
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THIS!! ITS BIGGER THAN I ORIGINALLY THOUGHT BUT PERFECT FOR SMACK DAB IN THE MIDDLE OF MY POOL. HAD SO MUCH FUN AND THE VOLLEY BALL IS REGULAR SIZE NOT MINIATURE LIKE MOST!! OVERALL GRRRRRRRREAT DEAL AND PRODUCT!! IF YOUR LOOKING AT THIS, GO ON AND GET IT, WHAT DO YOU HAVE TO LOSE BUT FUNNNNNN!! :) SERIOUSLY THO..
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Inflating was not an issue however putting the weights on was not super easy. We put two on hand weights in each of the anchor bags and the net piece still doesn’t dry in place. This was a cheap purchase and most definitely would not recommend nor would I purchase again. You get what you pay for with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: We have had so many hours of fun already with this set
customer_reviews.text: We have an in-ground pool 20 ft across and this fits well. For the price this is a no-brainer. Get a couple of extra balls and have a blast in the backyard. I had very low expectations, but for the price figured, why not. We have had so many hours of fun already with this set. Be aware, that the set does need to be weighed down with pebbles or small smooth rounded stones which you need to purchase separately before playing with the set.
customer_reviews.author: NJMomof2

customer_reviews.title: It's already in the garbage bin.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the very first time our grandkids started their first game! What a piece of junk! If I could give it ZERO STARS, I would. It's already in the garbage bin. :( :( :(. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: RobynRajk

customer_reviews.title: Big fun!
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable is a little flimsy, but we handle it with care and it's a lot of fun, especially when you consider the price. It's not going to give you world class volleyball, but fun for goofing around, especially with younger kids. One of our favs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying. The net Literally disintegrated.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this same item 3 times before. They have lasted through the swimming season and into the next year. Not this time. This time the net started falling apart. I think some different material was used for the string in the net than what was used in the past. Literally it disintegrated. I will not buy it again. It lasted about 6 weeks and part of that 6 weeks it was falling apart. We treated it no differently than ones we had over the past years.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Great game for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth such a great price. The inflatable ball isn't the best to play with. The ball blows away in the wind and is just too light in weight. We play with a heavier inflatable ball and it's much better. This is a great game anand we love having in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Maacje

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again or recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this as it is intended because it requires putting marbles or other heavy items in anchor bags. Fearing damage to the bottom of my pool liner, we just are letting this float on the water or playing with the ball without the net. I would not purchase again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: while the first box was a delivered sealed it was missing the net, the replacement came fully intact and has been used every day since, my two kids spend hours at a time just hitting the ball back and forth. it is the perfect height to be used by anyone young and old. anchors keep it in place when set up properly so your not having the net move away while playing. construction exceeds price, making this a great value. absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for a little more fun in your pool
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. The volleyball is a blow up ball made of flimsy light weight plastic. Can’t even play with it because it get blown away so easy. The net and frame are also very thin plastic. Hard to play with if there is even the slightest bit of wind. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Farley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expecting and we love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we expected and we love it. This billy ball net is perfect we just added some rocks to the bags that are included to keep it in one spot and it works amazing. Love this! And would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly made well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by this item. I really did not have high hopes that something this inexpensive could be as good as the more expensive sets, but when that's all you can afford, then you figure you'll make the best of it. However, we had the young adults from our church over for a swim party, and they had a blast. It floats on the water, but it has an anchor on each side and it does a reasonable job of holding the net in place. Our pool is kidney shaped, so it worked especially well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive way to play pool volleyball. It is really nice, because you can move it wherever you want in the pool. This is especially helpful when you are playing adults against children, so you can make the adults stand in deeper water. This appears to be good quality, but I didn't give it 5 stars because it moves around in the pool a little too much. It comes with weight bags, but even with them it appears to still move. Maybe another weight bag or two would help (we have tried increasing the weight in each bag) would help. Otherwise, it is great quality, and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and started blowing it up, we realized that there were 3 huge slashes in it. I did not use any sort of blade to open the box up, so I know they weren't cause by myself. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Best pool game we had on vacation. Should make the ball a bit better with some more weight because we kept having to get out of the pool to get it. Doesn't take much to make the ball go flying.
customer_reviews.author: Dan2131

customer_reviews.title: Fun volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: Fun volleyball net. It’s a great product for the price. The anchors don’t work too well. We added longer string and secure in place that way. We have had some fun volleyball games with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Pool Fun with this Volleyball Net
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this with a bit of caution, thinking it would end up being a non-use item for the pool. WRONG! It was a ton of fun for everyone all summer. Glad we bought it. Can't beat the fun for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my granddaughter, she and her friends love it, every time they come over to play in the pool, she always ask for the volley ball game, the ball is not a good volley ball for the game so I purchase another one from Walmart and it works perfectly, the volley ball net, is the perfect size for our 9x12x52" pool, I didn't use the anchors that cam with it because you have to fill them with water, I use string to tie each side to the side of the pool and the net don't move, with just a little extra effort it is a perfect volley ball net
customer_reviews.author: Ms G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for the grandkids to use in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the durability of the unit but have been totally happy with the sturdiness and durability.. We have a certain amount os windane it has held op well so far. Price was reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with it. Great to have some fun at the pool. We have a small pool and this was perfect for it. Very easy to put together and it lasted the whole summer and still is as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun family pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Only issue is even with heavy rocks in the bags the net still moves around unless the bags are put on the edges of the pool (which only works if your pool is skinny enough)
customer_reviews.author: R. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy For Price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Only thing that is not included (which should be obvious) is sand/rocks to put in anchor bags. Not good for a windy day, but the kids had fun and loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Rayanna Longsine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all...
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to blow up with air compressor seeing it's quite large. The only problem we had was the weight bags on the side to keep it from floating away. It was fun, but you have to find something heavy to keep it from floating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best items I have purchased recently. It was well worth the money. Everyone had a great time using it. It was easy to assemble and provided hours of fun. The weighted pouches were a bit of a challenge to fill (we used bottles of water but I recently purchased some lawn rocks to use next time) but it all worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H.

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this toy I did not realize that inflatable’s in a pool can be dangerous if there are a lot of children. The children can get hidden behind the inflatables and you might not see that they are under the water and also it’s easy to get caught in the net if you’re swimming. I would only recommend this for older children or adults. It’s a great idea but maybe not so safe for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: Our family had a blast this summer with the Volleyball Game. We used a regular volleyball as well as the one provided. I wouldnt use it in a pool much wider than 12 feet.
customer_reviews.author: budm108

customer_reviews.title: Worth the few bucks
customer_reviews.text: For the money yoy spend its a pretty good buy. Cheap enough that if it gets a leak at the end of summer you atill got your moneys worth. We prefer to put the weighted bags on the side of the pool instead of in it because it moves too much in the pool. Its not greatest quality but its held up and still has air in it. we have a 16ft wide pool and it doesnt fit the entire width of course but it does the job. my family still has a good time playing.
customer_reviews.author: SailrGirl13

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So worth $10. Doesn’t seem cheap at all. Has clips on the side so it stands straight up. After tieing the net on you may need to adjust them to make it even. Same with the weight bags. Threw a few rocks from our landscap in and it worked perfect. Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.author: KC0522

customer_reviews.title: Hit at my pool party
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, we wasn't able to use the weights looks possible, During Play we Popped the ball :( Overall Great fun! It does come with a patch, Big Hit at my pool party! :)
customer_reviews.author: TaxLadyDC

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Game
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up (easier with an air compressor) and use. The weights provided (once filled with rocks) help to stabilize and keep the net in place as you play. The adjustable net is nice so that the kids can play too and not have to struggle to get it over. Provided great entertainment at a pool party but was just as fun with only a few playing. Enjoyed playing this! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this would work well especially since it’s inexpensive. But we have played hours of games kids and adults. It does move around when you play even when weighted down with rocks. But our pool is too wide for a regular net so this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Denham

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a good price. When I first received it and blew it up it was leaking air so I put one of the patches on it and covered it up and never had another problem with it. Kids had fun playing with it whenever they used it. I just put some big river rock in the bag not any small ones that could fall out and it held the net in place pretty good. I wish the net wouldn't bend in on itself so much but it's an easy fix and that was my only problem with it, besides the hole in the beginning. It was delivered in a timely manner as usual with prime membership
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool sport
customer_reviews.text: The ball ⚽️ could have been a little bigger and can easily be inflated with a pump if you have one. Its little tedious to blow by mouth. Fun pool game for kids and adults. We used it for a cocktail/ pool party, sadly lost the ball over a cliff.
customer_reviews.author: Ek-ta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The weight bags are a little strange but we put weights in them and put them on each side of the pool instead on the bottom of the pool. Great quality and has held up pretty well for a full summer of kids!
customer_reviews.author: Emashburn

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Definitely have to put weights in it
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. Kids love it. Definitely have to put weights in it. I did think it was wider and we could tie it to each side of the pool because the pool is only 15 feet across. Nope! Probably want to invest in a heavier ball this one will blow away or if there is a little wind it definitely won't work for volleyball. Great product for the price. Like others recommend I take the net down when not in use so it doesn't dry rot or fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jennell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Stayed inflated
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our daughters swim party. The VB included is very small so we purchased an. XL inflatable VB and it will make it even more fun!! Haven’t put it in the pool yet. Will return and include in review after the party. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystee A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay Put in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly as pictured. Unfortunately, that's not a good thing: it's not really that wide, and it just floats in the pool. There isn't really an effective way to keep the net in one place, so it ends up moving around in the pool. Additionally, inflatable volleyball it comes with is pretty useless -- it's small and way too light to actually be used as a volleyball for a game. The product title says 6+, and I can imagine that this product would be fun for kids, but if you're actually want to play any kind of a legitimate volleyball game this product is not what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best toy for the pool. Product is very affordable on amazon, and it comes with a ball as well. my kids love it and it has been the product they keep using and never get bored. good quality, and even if it breaks i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoyed it at the pool party
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly into out 12 foot round pool. Kids enjoyed it at the pool party. It's vinyl so of course you need to be careful mourned sharp objects. Can put this propped up between two tables as well and weighted down provides some fun lawn volleyball a well, for the not serious competitors. Will update at that endow the season but so far, no regrets on the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: FUN INFLATABLE
customer_reviews.text: All in all it's a cool toy and fun in the pool. However, the ball is too light to play with and even the slightest hit launches it too far. We replaced it with a dodge ball type ball, and now its great.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wittenborn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, hasn't gotten much use.
customer_reviews.text: We have not really used this item as much as we had anticipated however our minpin will not stop humping it!! The price is good even comes with a small ball. We resorted to water bottles to use as weights. It does fit across the pool. Holding up to summer sun, and a pervy dog!
customer_reviews.author: M&GManning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you are not wanting the hassle of a real net!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a volleyball net and this is what we ended it up getting. The net is real and nit plastic which is great! It works for us as we didn’t want to put up and take down a net from our pool all the time. It’s sturdy and is held in place fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and fun pool activity
customer_reviews.text: Love this volleyball set up. I recently moved to a house with a nice size pool. This set is very easy to set up and use. We play volleyball and laugh and have fun in the pool!! We are all in our 50's so fun isn't just for kids. :)
customer_reviews.author: big red

customer_reviews.title: Big yikes
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this thing HARD to inflate omg. It has one single hole to inflate the entire thing and then blows all around the pool. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: h20 volleyball
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net worked perfectly for our youth end of the year party!! It blew up fairly easy... and the kids loved it! It has bags for weights that keep it floating perfectly!! We have enjoyed it for 2 summers now and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Howard

customer_reviews.title: Solid Fun
customer_reviews.text: This pool toy is definitely a lot of fun. I think it is to be expected that it will not be made of the highest quality. Taking that into consideration and how much it cost, we definitely like this product. The netting is a bit oddly crafted. The weaving is not consistent and because of this the top portion of the net is already falling apart. This happened on day one during installation. The sewing job on the top of the net is different than the rest and causes for a weak point to break. This sort of thing is to be expected at this cost. Still, we love it and are happy to own it.
customer_reviews.author: AmaBuy Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s 20th birthday and we had a lot of fun with it. It is a lot bigger than we expected! Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really great and made well. We put the heavy weighted bags on each side of the pool instead of dropped him straight down into the water and it seems to hold it in place better .
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Imaginext!

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s good!
customer_reviews.text: Cute for the kids to play with in the pool. Easy to put together but it’s hard to get it to keep from moving while playing. For the price though you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A blast for summer. Will float around in pool if not tied down. Comes with little bags to fill with sand/dirt to hold down also.
customer_reviews.author: Laylon Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very large for in pool
customer_reviews.text: Kept moving even with weighted bags in pool. Put bags on each side of the pool on concrete and stayed in place a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My only wish is that the anchors where easier. We didn’t have sandbags so we put water bottles in it. It wasn’t heavy enough but lasted for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kalypso

product_meta.title: Intex Pool Volleyball Game, 94in X 25in X 36in, for Ages 6+
product_meta.description:
56508EP Features: -Pool volleyball game.-For ages 3 years and up. Includes: -Anchor bags included to hold floating net in position.-Includes inflatable volleyball and floating net.-Repair patch included. Dimensions: -Inflated dimensions: 25" H x 94" W x 36" D.-Package dimensions: 8.94" H x 8" W x 3.19" D.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Enjoy this green and yellow 94" x 25" x 36" inflatable volleyball game. Includes a repair kit. Also has a shelf box. Color may vary
feature_bullets: Comes with an inflatable volleyball and the pole bases are grommeted to add anchor weights of desired
Made from sturdy 10-gauge vinyl with a 7-gauge vinyl ball.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars5,136 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
